questionnaire.name: Module 3: Conclusion and reflection

survey.name: Module 3: Conclusion and reflection
survey.title: Module 3: Conclusion and reflection
survey.thank_body:
You have now completed Module 3.

High-quality pre-apprenticeship programs are tailored to participant and industry needs. Importantly, these needs may change over time and the best pre-apprenticeships build in ongoing feedback and iteration processes. You will learn more about how to do this in Topic 4.1: Measuring outcomes. 

Proceed to Module 4 by clicking "Continue" below.

question.content: What skills and knowledge will participants need before they start your pre-apprenticeship program? This might include specific academic, workforce, or occupational skills. (Required)
How will you assess whether participants meet your pre-apprenticeship program’s entry requirements? (Required)
What other requirements might participants need to meet? For example, a license to drive or high school equivalency diploma. (Required)
How will your pre-apprenticeship program design reflect the needs and commitments of your participants? For example, work or caregiving responsibilities. (Required)
What specific support services might your participants need? (Required)
Does your organization have the capacity to deliver support services internally, or will you need to partner with another organization? (Required)
How will your pre-apprenticeship program design reflect the needs and commitments of your participants? For example, work or caregiving responsibilities.
